_header: My lord with heart I pray thee withouten voice will still
_description: Oracio bona — one couplet from John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Mi lord with herte I preyȝe withouten vois wol stilleÞi wil
                    to knowen þu grante me þat it mote fulfille
NLS18721.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Popular Prayers in Middle English Verse.” 
             Modern Philology
         36 (1939): 337-50: 346 (including 3535).
